channel.title: Plzzz help need ASAP
channel.description: Here is the link to the code for my CommandPacketHandler.java http://txtb.in/hPS This is the file which i need to edit to make the console for admins only, I know this because i tried another CommandPacketHandler.java With soo much less commands and it worked, so someone please tell me how i can make console for admins only PLEASE ALL MY PLAYERS ARE WAITING FOR ME TO PUT THE SERVER BACK UP!! AND I AM USING CORRUPTIONX SOURCE 562!

item.title: Plzzz help need ASAP
item.dc:creator: @jockedaman jockedaman
item.description:
@jockedaman wrote:

Hello dude,at the bottom of your commandpackethandler.java

u see that topplayer and tonpc code this my code itâ€™s just a little bid different from urs
im using the jagex scape source 562 but i belive it should work god luck bro

else if(cmd[0].equals("tonpc")) {
			if(player.getRights() < 2) {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("This command is for Admins only.");
				return;
			}
				player.Render = Integer.valueOf(player.getNpcRender());
				player.getAppearance().transformToNpc(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]));
				player.getUpdateFlags().setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);
			} else if(cmd[0].equals("toplayer")) {
			if(player.getRights() < 2) {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("This command is for Admins only.");
				return;
			}
				player.getAppearance().transformToPlayer();
				player.getUpdateFlags().setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);
			} else {
				ScriptManager.getInstance().call("command_"+cmd[0], player, cmd);
			}
		} else {
			player.sm("Commandscreen for admin use only... You do commands using ::commands");
			}
		} catch(Exception e) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Malformed command or error: " + e.getMessage() + ".");
			//e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

}
